motions.title: Motion to Amend Agenda to Add Second Officer Swearing In
motions.description: Motion to amend the agenda to add a second officer swearing in.

motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • Approval of November 27, 2023, City Council Meeting Minutes • Resolution Appointing Members to Serve on the Audit Committee • Resolution Appointing Members to Serve on Discover Dunwoody • Resolution Appointing Members to Serve on the Dunwoody Art Commission • Resolution Appointing Members to Serve on the Sustainability Committee • Construction Agreement with the Georgia Department of Transportation for the Ashford Dunwoody Eastbound On-Ramp Widening Project • Approval of an Agreement with the Georgia Department of Transportation for the Ashford Dunwoody Interchange Scoping Study

motions.title: Discover Dunwoody Proposed FY2024 Budget
motions.description: Approval of Discover Dunwoody Proposed FY2024 Budget.

motions.title: Contract Amendment with Ogletree Enterprises for Additional Landscaping
motions.description: Approval of a contract amendment with Ogletree Enterprises for additional landscaping for the Spalding Drive Intersection Improvement.

motions.title: Contract Amendment with Practical Design Partners for Vermack Road Path Project
motions.description: Approval of a contract amendment with Practical Design Partners for design changes on the Vermack Road Path Project.

motions.title: Motion to Enter Executive Session
motions.description: Motion to adjourn to executive session for legal purposes.

publicHearings.title: Review and Consideration of a Text Amendment to Amend the Sign Code Regulations and Procedures for Animated Signs, Chapter 20
publicHearings.description: Text amendment to clarify regulations on animated signs and provide standards for residential districts while continuing to prohibit them in commercial districts.
